Dakfate/Darkfate's troops::

Darkfate and his troops covered of blast


--- In nbwrpg@y..., JP3884@a... wrote:
>        Rampage, Tankkor, Inferno, Marine, and Gremlin went to the 
outside of 
> the ship. There were numerous repair drones re-enforcing the hull 
and 
> repairing overloaded autoguns. The foursome climed to the top of 
the vessle, 
> and took positions on four powerful manule attack canons. They were 
double 
> barrled plasma and particle guns with a semicircular covering in 
front, but 
> behinde the shields there was no risk of being hit.
>        The four Predacons targeted Galvatron, Destructor, Darkfate, 
and the 
> other Destrons. The blasts sent a loud and powerful crack of 
discharge flying 
> at the bots.
